alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 10:16AM PST until December 27 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches above 5000 feet starting this afternoon, and up to 3 inches possible between 4000 and 5000 feet. Southwest winds gusting to 50 mph at higher elevations will likely cause reduced visibilities in blowing snow. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will likely be very difficult in the mountains with significant delays and possible road closures. Snow will likely lower to pass level this morning and again this evening, with a couple inches of snow accumulation possible along Interstate 5 near the Grapevine.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains
